snippet.title: VR Ping Pong Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/492710

Ping Pong VR is the first simulator that thanks to VR technology, and with the help of SteamVR Controllers, brings a ping pong table into your lounge. Using 1:1 scale with virtual reality, you will have the sensation of play ping pong in reality but inside a voxel world.
